entry.title: 0.4 Release Candidate 2
entry.summary: The message thread includes various users discussing Bitcoin and related issues. One user reports an error message received when closing Bitcoin with the network still online. They provide information about their system, including running Ubuntu 11.04 on 32 bits. Another user discusses their preference for tracking every address associated with their Bitcoin account, including dynamic addresses generated when they receive Bitcoin payments. They suggest leaving this feature as an option but disabled by default. The discussion also touches on concerns about anonymity and labeling Bitcoin addresses.
